diff_hunk:
@@ -3,11 +3,15 @@ nav.actions
     li = link_to 'My Team', current_student.current_team, class: 'btn btn-default btn-sm' if current_student.current_team
     li = link_to icon('plus', 'New Team'), new_team_path, class: 'btn btn-primary btn-sm' if can? :create, Team.new(season: Season.current)
   div.pull-right.dropdown
-    button.dropdown-toggle.form-control  data-toggle="dropdown"

       | Past Teams

body:
Hm, maybe you forgot to push the change? I don't see it 🙈

It's literally this syntax:
```
span.caret<
```

In the changes I just see a "normal" whitespace after the `Past Teams` - this unfortunately does not work with all browsers plus most editors (mine for instance) remove trailing whitespace so this won't be around for too long 😞 

Could you update to use the slim syntax? Then we're good to merge.
